title: Ticket #7275: Python RemoteParam not case-insensitive
description:
The Python RemoteParam object does not appear to be case-insensitive. For example, this works: 

>>> htcondor.param["FULL_HOSTNAME"]
'siren.cs.wisc.edu'
>>> htcondor.param["full_hostname"]
'siren.cs.wisc.edu'

but this doesn't: 

>>> daemon_ad = htcondor.Collector().locate(htcondor.DaemonTypes.Master)
>>> param = htcondor.RemoteParam(daemon_ad)
>>> param["FULL_HOSTNAME"]
'siren.cs.wisc.edu'
>>> param["full_hostname"]
KeyError: 'full_hostname'
creator: matyas
